vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.23.18;
son of: Izhar (H3324);
brother of: Korah (H7141I), Nepheg (H5298) and Zichri (H2147);
father of: Jahath (H3189J); also called Shelomoth at 1Ch.24.22;
Also named: she.lo.mot (שְׁלֹמוֹת "Shelomoth" H8013J)
§ Shelomith = "peaceful"
n pr m
1) a Gershonite Levite, son of Zichri in the time of David
1a) also 'Shelomoth' (שְׁלֹמוֹת H8013H)
2) son of king Rehoboam of Judah by Maacah the granddaughter of Absalom
3) head of a family of exiles who returned with Ezra
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hija de Dibrí; (b)   hija de Pedaías; tribu de Judá; (c)   hijo de Simí; levita; en tiempos del rey David; (d) שְׁלוֹמוֹת   descendiente de Ishar; levita; en tiempos del rey David; (e) שְׁלוֹמִית   hijo de Zicrí; levita; en tiempos del rey David; (f)   hijo del rey Roboam; (g)   jefe de familia; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
示羅密 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "和平的"
陽性專有名詞 人名
1) 大衛王時一位革舜支派的利未人, 細基利的兒子
1a) 亦作 '示羅摩'; 和 08013 同 (代上 26:25)
2) 猶大王羅波安和押沙龍的孫女(合和本#代下 11:20|譯作女兒)瑪迦
所生的兒子之一
3) 隨以斯拉歸回的一位族長(拉 8:10)
陰性專有名詞 人名
4) 摩西時代的一位但支派的婦女, 底伯利的女兒, 她的兒子褻瀆了神
而受石刑而死 (利 24:11)
5) 所羅巴伯的女兒 (代上 3:19)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
示罗密 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "和平的"
阳性专有名词 人名
1) 大卫王时一位革舜支派的利未人, 细基利的儿子
1a) 亦作 '示罗摩'; 和 08013 同 (代上 26:25)
2) 犹大王罗波安和押沙龙的孙女(合和本#代下 11:20|译作女儿)玛迦
所生的儿子之一
3) 随以斯拉归回的一位族长(拉 8:10)
阴性专有名词 人名
4) 摩西时代的一位但支派的妇女, 底伯利的女儿, 她的儿子亵渎了神
而受石刑而死 (利 24:11)
5) 所罗巴伯的女儿 (代上 3:19)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Lev.24.11;
daughter of: Dibri (H1704)
§ Shelomith = "peaceful"
n pr f
1) a woman of Dan, daughter of Dibri, and mother of a son who blasphemed God and was stoned to death in the time of Moses
2) daughter of Zerubbabel

A woman of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.11.20;
daughter of: Rehoboam (H7346) and Maacah (H4601K);
sister of: Abijah (H0029I), Attai (H6262I) and Ziza (H2124H);
half-sister of: Jeush (H3266K), Shemariah (H8114H) and Zaham (H2093)
§ Shelomith = "peaceful"
n pr f
1) a woman of Dan, daughter of Dibri, and mother of a son who blasphemed God and was stoned to death in the time of Moses
2) daughter of Zerubbabel

A woman living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.8.10;
daughter of: Josiphiah (H3131)
§ Shelomith = "peaceful"
n pr f
1) a woman of Dan, daughter of Dibri, and mother of a son who blasphemed God and was stoned to death in the time of Moses
2) daughter of Zerubbabel

A woman of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.19;
daughter of: Zerubbabel (H2216);
sister of: Meshullam (H4918H), Hananiah (H2608L), Hashubah (H2807), Ohel (H0169), Berechiah (H1296), Hasadiah (H2619), Jushab-hesed (H3142), Abiud (G0010)
§ Shelomith = "peaceful"
n pr f
1) a woman of Dan, daughter of Dibri, and mother of a son who blasphemed God and was stoned to death in the time of Moses
2) daughter of Zerubbabel

vocabinfos.mediumDef:

son of: Ladan@1Ch.23.8 (H8096W);
brother of: Haziel (H2381) and Haran (H2039H)
Another name of she.lo.mot (שְׁלֹמוֹת "Shelomoth" H8013)
§ Shelomith = "peaceful"
n pr f
1) a woman of Dan, daughter of Dibri, and mother of a son who blasphemed God and was stoned to death in the time of Moses
2) daughter of Zerubbabel
